Google Firebase Crashlytics is used to collect crash reports which help us fix any issues more quickly.
Google Firebase Analytics is used to help us build a picture of how the app is used to inform updates and new developments.
Welcome to the gateway to the Marvel Universe. Enjoy extensive content for Marvel related content from heroes to comics and specific series.
Looking for a specific hero that has suddenly surfaced? You can search for any character, comic, series or event by name.
The Avengers team needs your assistance. Build your dream team by selecting your favorite heroes!!
